title: Is there a configuration to show more months in the Calendar side bar?
content: Hi Team FFox! I often need to plan several months ahead (doesn't everyone?) and would like to see the next 3-4 months in the calendar sidebar. I'm used to this view from Outlook and find it exceptionally useful. I just upgraded to version 105 and was hoping it would be configurable, but cannot find it anywhere. IMHO having just one month is redundant with the main calendar view. Am I missing something? Thanks in advance!
creator: pocket22

title: SuperNova menu font size
content: I have recentkly submitted questions about issues regarding the menu font size I am experiencing after installing SuperNova, so much so that its affecting my ability to access events on my calendar. I just tested toi see if this was also the situation on my laptops and I found it is not. I uninstalled and reinstalled SuperNova on my PC and continue to experience the same issue. What could be the issue on my PC that is causing this oversized font. It is only happening with SuperNova and not on any other application.
creator: mozfan2

title: Folders in version 102.1501
content: I just installed version 102.15.1. (I went back down from the latest versions which had problems for me). The only folder shown for each account are Inbox and Deleted. How do I get others like Sent and Junk? How can I recover the contents of those from my earlier versions?
creator: gold.albert
